adjectives.description: faintful (comparative more faintful, superlative most faintful)

entries.meaning: Displaying weakness, frailty, or faintness; fainting; dejected
examples: The shepherd sighs upon the barren hills / To see his bleating lambs with faintful looks / Behold the vallies robb'd of springing flowers, / That whilom wont to yield them yearly food.
